title: Bank Run
description: If the Beast is adjacent to a Market, move the Beast onto that Market. Every Acolyte adjacent to that Market moves to there and dies immediately.

title: Enrage the Beast
description: Kill every Acolyte adjacent to the Beast. Colossi adjacent to the Beast must move 1 space away from the Beast. Resolve Colossus movement in order beginning with the player who played this card.

title: Eruption
description: Kill every Acolyte adjacent to the Volcano. Colossi adjacent to the Volcano must move 1 space away from the Volcano. Resolve Colossus movement in order beginning with the player who played this card.

title: Ghouls!
description: Every player with at least 1 Acolyte on a Ruins tile must discard 2 cards of their choosing.

title: Landslide
description: Pick up any 2 Loot Tokens and move each of them to a different spaces. You may move the tokens to Landmark tiles or spaces that already have Loot tokens and increase the reward for those spaces.

title: Power Surge
description: Locate the Hallowed Ground tile with the most Acolytes (if multiple spaces are tied, all the tied spaces are affected). Kill all Acolytes and destroy any Banner on that space.

title: Rampage
description: Move the Beast twice (the Beast can only move to adjacent spaces). In both spaces you moved to, kill all Acolytes and force Colossi to move to adjacent spaces (each Colossus is moved by its owner).

title: Ransack
description: Draw 3 Beast cards. Put 1 of the cards back on top of the deck, discard 1 of them, and then play 1 of them immediately.

title: Ritual Sacrifice
description: For any Acolyte (including your own Acolytes) on any of the Landmark tiles, roll the die, and kill the Acolyte if you roll 1 or 2 (Clarify which Acolyte you are rolling for before each roll).

title: Sabotage
description: Choose up to 3 spaces that have Banners but do not have Acolytes or Colossi on them. Remove the Banners there and return them to their ownersâ€™ hands.

title: Take Flight
description: Pick up the Beast and place it on any space other than the Volcano. Kill all Acolytes on that space and move any Colossi to adjacent spaces as usual (each Colossus on that space is moved by its owner).

title: Terraform
description: Pick a Loot token on a space that is not occupied by the Beast or Colossi, then swap that token with the Volcano tile. On the new Volcano space, kill all Acolytes and destroy any Banner there.
